name: Rainmeter Skin File
summary: Learn about .RMSKIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: RMSKIN files contain five directories the skin content: Addons, Fonts, Plugins, Skins, and Themes. They also contain a ".cfg" file in the root directory which contains metadata, such as the name, author, and version.

Since RMSKIN files are compressed .ZIP files, you can rename their extension to ".zip" and decompress them with any Zip decompression utility. You can also create them by compressing a ZIP file and renaming the extension to ".rmskin."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
